testcase.name: Order food
testcase.system-out: Given the user launch Dominos url...........................................passed When the user click order online now button Naviates The user to location page.passed And user enter the adress and Pin code in Loaction Field....................passed And the user click VEG PIZZA in the top of the margin menu..................passed And user Have to click the Margherita pizza add to card.....................passed And user Have to I want to add extra cheese Page............................passed And user Have to click the Margherita pizza Two Qty.........................passed And user Have to click the Peppy Paneer pizza add to card...................passed And user Have to click the Peppy Paneer pizza Two Qty.......................passed And the user click BEVERAGES in the top of the margin menu..................passed And user Have to click the Pepsi 475ml add to card..........................passed And user have to click thePepsi 475ml twelve Qty............................passed When the user remove one qty Margherita from the cart......................passed And the user remove six qty Pepsi 475ml from the cart.......................passed And the user verify the cart click the checkout button......................passed And the user view the place order page......................................passed Then the user verify the address and price details click place order button.passed
